learning_outcomes.description: Understand why and how to reformulate financial statements to facilitate equity valuation and financial statement analysis
Understand how to apply and evaluate accounting-based valuation models, including forecasting of financial statements.
Analyse financial ratios to determine the drivers of profitability and growth, and to assist with forecasting
Assess accounting quality, understand the motivations for earnings management, and understand common techniques used to manage earnings

assessments.assessment_title: Financial analysis and valuation project part 1
assessments.task_description: The project requires students to complete a detailed financial statement analysis and valuation of a publicly listed company, applying the concepts from the first eight lectures/tutorials.The project will be completed in two parts. Part 1 will focus on applying concepts taught in the first four lectures/tutorials.Full details will be provided by the end of week one of semester through the Course Information Document which will be posted on Learn.UQ.AI Statement:This project is to be completed individually.
